attributes.action: Ammend ban from driving after 12 points on licence due to minor speed infringements due to Gatso Cameras
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is too easy to loose ones licence through minor speed infringements captured by speed cameras this can have a major effect on peoples livelyhoods, long term as the need for transport to get you to work is not an acceptable excuse in court. instead Introduce a scale of stiff penalty payments increasing with each offence, but do not destroy peoples lives when they loose thier licence and thier jobs and everything else that goes with it.
